stories.headline: Shipping giant MSC facilitates trade from Israeli settlements through EU
stories.description: Commercial documents shed light on hundreds of shipments from illegal Israeli settlements in the occupied West Bank.

stories.headline: At least 53 people dead or missing after boat capsizes off Libya coast
stories.description: This is a breaking news story.

stories.headline: William and Catherine 'deeply concerned' over Jeffrey Epstein revelations
stories.description: It comes after documents released in the US shone new light on the scandal, including over Epstein's ties with Andrew.

stories.headline: UK leader Starmer hangs on to his job in wake of more Epstein revelations
stories.description: Starmer faces crisis after Epstein revelations threaten his leadership.

stories.headline: Netanyahu to meet Trump in US to discuss Iran, says Israeli PM
stories.description: The Israeli PM wants US-Iran talks to address Tehran’s ballistic missiles – a red line for Tehran.
